criteria: CI pipeline passes (lint, test, >80% coverage). CD pipeline successfully deploys service to staging EKS. Service is healthy and accessible via Ingress.
success_metrics: Zero deployment rollbacks; All CI checks passing for `main` branch.

criteria: All authentication and authorization flows are tested and secure. RBAC is enforced on all admin APIs. Audit trail logs all critical actions. DPDP compliance features (consent, erasure) are functional.
bypass_criteria: Critical security finding must be fixed before release.
success_metrics: Zero critical or high-severity security vulnerabilities found; All compliance ACs met.
